name: Budgeting Basics
title: Learn how to create and manage a budget to achieve your financial goals. Understand income, expenses, and saving strategies.

name: Investing 101
title: A comprehensive guide to the fundamentals of investing, including stocks, bonds, and mutual funds. Perfect for beginners.

name: Credit Management
title: Master the art of managing your credit score, understanding credit reports, and improving your creditworthiness.
